name: INTask
desc: An individual task the user needs to complete.

items.name: init(title: INSpeakableString, status: INTaskStatus, taskType: INTaskType, spatialEventTrigger: INSpatialEventTrigger?, temporalEventTrigger: INTemporalEventTrigger?, createdDateComponents: DateComponents?, modifiedDateComponents: DateComponents?, identifier: String?, priority: INTaskPriority)
items.desc: Initializes a task object with the specified content and triggers.

items.name: init(title: INSpeakableString, status: INTaskStatus, taskType: INTaskType, spatialEventTrigger: INSpatialEventTrigger?, temporalEventTrigger: INTemporalEventTrigger?, createdDateComponents: DateComponents?, modifiedDateComponents: DateComponents?, identifier: String?)
items.desc: Initializes a task object with the specified content and triggers.

items.name: var title: INSpeakableString
items.desc: The text that describes the task.

items.name: var status: INTaskStatus
items.desc: The current completion state of the task.

items.name: enum INTaskStatus
items.desc: Constants indicating the completion state of a task.

items.name: var temporalEventTrigger: INTemporalEventTrigger?
items.desc: A time-based trigger that reminds the user to complete the task.

items.name: var spatialEventTrigger: INSpatialEventTrigger?
items.desc: A location-based trigger that reminds the user to complete the task.

items.name: var createdDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The initial creation date of the task.

items.name: var modifiedDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The date on which the intent updated the task.

items.name: var taskType: INTaskType
items.desc: Information about the behavior of the task in your app.

items.name: enum INTaskType
items.desc: Constants indicating how the task behaves.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier that your app uses to identify the task.
